name: Wavestep
description:
_ _____ _ _____________________________ | | / / | | / / ____/ ___/_ __/ ____/ __ \ | | /| / / /| | | / / __/ \__ \ / / / __/ / /_/ / | |/ |/ / ___ | |/ / /___ ___/ // / / /___/ ____/ |__/|__/_/ |_|___/_____//____//_/ /_____/_/

Gameplay:

   The evil Orb empire has come to take away your [AESTHETIC] vibes.

   Defend the galaxy from these abominous stones by 
     (1) increasing your Z coordinate and 
     (2) skewering orbs on your
            Twin
              Lasers
                Of
                  DOOM~~~

Controls:
   WASD for controlling the ship
   HOLD left-mouse to charge, RELEASE to fire!
   Escape to quit

Developers: 
   mame (https://itch.io/profile/mamecccci)
   cheddarmachine

SFX/Soundtrack: 
   Luis Enriquez

Health icons: 
   Smashicons on flaticon.com

Select 3D Models: 
   Licenses included in LICENSES folder
